thread.title: Denzel Washington's Reaction to Casey Affleck's Oscar Speech Says It All
thread.title_full: Denzel Washington's Reaction to Casey Affleck's Oscar Speech Says It All

title: Denzel Washington's Reaction to Casey Affleck's Oscar Speech Says It All
text: Denzel Washington's Reaction to Casey Affleck's Oscar Speech Says It All Most Popular By Sally Holmes Feb 27, 2017 Tonight, Casey Affleck won the Oscar for Best Actor for his role in Manchester By the Sea . The actor, who has been accused of sexual harassment by two women , thanked Denzel Washington in his acceptance speech: "It means so much to me, thank you. Whew, damn it. One of the first people who taught me how to act was Denzel Washington, and I just met him tonight for the first time. Thank you." This was Denzel's reaction:
